generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Entity Ocelotattack Behavior
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Controls specific attack behavior for Ocelots.

fields.title: Max Distance
fields.description: Max distance from the target, this entity will use this attack behavior.

fields.title: Max Sneak Range
fields.description: Max distance from the target, this entity starts sneaking.

fields.title: Max Sprint Range
fields.description: Max distance from the target, this entity starts sprinting (sprinting takes priority over sneaking).

fields.title: Reach Multiplier
fields.description: Used with the base size of the entity to determine minimum target-distance before trying to deal attack damage.

fields.title: Sneak Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Modifies the attacking entity's movement speed while sneaking.

fields.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Modifies the attacking entity's movement speed while sprinting.

fields.title: Walk Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Modifies the attacking entity's movement speed when not sneaking or sprinting, but still within attack range.

fields.title: x Max Rotation
fields.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the X-axis, this entity can rotate while trying to look at the target.

fields.title: y Max Head Rotation
fields.description: Maximum rotation (in degrees), on the Y-axis, this entity's head can rotate while trying to look at the target.
